page.title: 21Calne Motorcycle Meet
page.content:
The Motorcycle Meet is the largest free bike event in the South west which takes place every year on the penultimate weekend of July 10 o clock- 4 o clock .Over a hundred bikers come for the cycle meet. The bikers love to meet up and have a drink and chat to waste time for a day. It is set next to the town hall in the centre of Calne .All different makes of motorbikes from Honda to Suzuki to B.M.W..This special event occurs to raise money for all different charities.The motor cycle meet is so very popular with people from all over the WORLD joining in.

As you can see there are very strange bikes but they are HUGE attractions appealing to not only motorcyclists but to all.


Contribution by: Kelsey Peapell
